QuestData.Title: Preying on the Predators
QuestData.Description: The forest has become far more dangerous ever since Shen-zin Su began shaking. The tigers are agitated and have begun attacking the refugees, and on occasion, me as well.$B$BIf these injured and weak survivors are to make it to safety here at the hut, we need to help clear the forest for them.
QuestData.RewardText: These survivors are in your debt, $c.
